content.p: Come and talk to employers who are keen to recruit you for their internship and graduate opportunities. Check out the individual fair webpages for a list of companies attending and find out how to register for these fairs. Our scheduled fairs for the autumn term have now finished. Below you can find all of the past fairs and links to the employers who attended to see any current vacancies they may have. This fair has now finished. You can visit the fair page to find a list of organisations that attended and any vacancies they currently have on MyCareer. The Careers and Employability Service offers an impartial service which enables all students to make informed choices about their futures. We expect students to respect all members of our community. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
